main¶

class src.scripts.misc.Direction(value)¶

A clock-wise lateral dynamically incremental compass used to tell the direction relative to the grid.

Each direction Is iterable and can be iterated over infinitely to return a string based representation of each compass direction (orientation) or a number representing the orientation (digit); ‘n’ | 0 (North), ‘e’ | 1 (East), ‘s’ | 2 (South) and ‘w’ | 3 (West)

Parameters

value (str | int) – string character (n, s, e, w) or 0-3

static convert(value)¶

set orientation equivalent to the digit and vice versa

Parameters

value – orientation or digit

Returns

return the opposite value of the one passed in through value, e.g. passing in orientation will return the digit

property digit¶

get digit

Returns

digit representing the direction

is_north_or_south()¶

check if direction is north or south

Returns

True/False

property orientation¶

get direction

Returns

string representation of direction
